name: The Renaissance Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
This stunning French Chateau venue is a beautifully restored castle from the Renaissance period. We are located 45 minutes away from Toulouse Int'l Airport, on the banks of the Garonne river, with the Pyrénées mountains at close range. The Chateau is surrounded by historical rural buildings and beautiful woods. Since 2015, we have been hosting fabulous weddings for couples coming from all over the world and as far as New Zealand, in addition to the UK and Ireland.
This Renaissance Castle offers adaptable spaces for groups of 10 to more than 500 people. The total accommodation is 20 adults (plus children) in the seven suites of the castle and the three rooms of the farmhouse of the castle which is on the other side of the lawn, 100 meters from the castle, and dates from 1854.
In the plenary format the reception room comfortably accommodates 150 participants and the chateau rooms then become subcommittee rooms.
We will offer you the perfect place to make your event a success. The quotes are made on request according to the number of participants, the duration of your event and your wishes. All services are tailor-made. We will put our expertise at work to make you dream wedding come true. Come and spend the best day of your life in a magical environment!
A catering space is available for the reception room and the courtyard of the farm. Possibility of a private chef for intimate meals in the rooms of the castle is also available throughout your stay.
The rooms can be equipped according to your requests and needs and you can get together inside but also enjoy the natural surroundings of the Chateau.
additional_info:
